scripts.dev: concurrently --names "Django,HTTPServer,Svelte" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run dev-backend" "npm run dev-frontend" "npm run dev-svelte"
scripts.dev-all: concurrently --names "Tickets,Go,Files,Front" -c "bgMagenta.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgWhite.bold" "bash -c 'cd /home/pepe/Documentos/ruby/tickets && npm run dev 2>/dev/null'" "bash -c 'cd /home/pepe/Documentos/go/accesos && go run main.go 2>/dev/null'" "bash -c 'cd /home/pepe/Documentos/ruby/files && npm run dev 2>/dev/null'" "npm run dev"
